name: What Lurks in the Shadows
description:
Synopsis

What should be a normal walk home from your night shift at the diner takes a horrifying turn. There has been an SCP containment breach and they have made it to the streets! You must be cautious and find your way home using just your map and your torch!

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Click - Toggle Torch

Right Click - Zoom

F - Interact

CTRL - Crouch

Shift - Run

Extra

If you come across any bugs let me know and I'll fix them asap!

If you enjoy the game consider leaving a tip!
